fields.name: Inspiration:
fields.value:
I hate conversion roles!!! I hate conversion roles!!!!
Defense: Basic

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - If you are transformed, you may suck the blood from two players, killing them and cleaning them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You appear Innocent while not transformed. You appear suspicious while transformed.
- On full moons, if you have no visitors, you transform into a Vampire.
- You may transform back to your human form by not visiting anyone at night. This does not happen if you can't visit anyone due to roleblocks or other disruption abilities.
- If you are roleblocked, you rampage at home and clean anyone who visits you.
